verses.verse: ק֥וּמִי <WH6965> Arise א֖וֹרִי <WH215> shine כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָ֣א <WH935> is come אוֹרֵ֑ךְ <WH216> for thy light וּכְב֥וֹד <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עָלַ֥יִךְ <WH5921> and זָרָֽח׃ <WH2224> is risen

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הַחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> For behold the darkness יְכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> shall cover אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וַעֲרָפֶ֖ל <WH6205> and gross darkness לְאֻמִּ֑ים <WH3816> the people וְעָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> and יִזְרַ֣ח <WH2224> shall arise יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> but the LORD וּכְבוֹד֖וֹ <WH3519> upon thee and his glory עָלַ֥יִךְ <WH5921> and יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> shall be seen
וְהָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> shall come גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> And the Gentiles לְאוֹרֵ֑ךְ <WH216> to thy light וּמְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> and kings לְנֹ֥גַהּ <WH5051> to the brightness זַרְחֵֽךְ׃ <WH2225> of thy rising

שְׂאִֽי־ <WH5375> Lift up סָבִ֤יב <WH5439> round about עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5869> thine eyes וּרְאִ֔י <WH7200> and see כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> all they gather themselves together בָֽאוּ־ <WH935> they come לָ֑ךְ בָּנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1121> to thee thy sons מֵרָח֣וֹק <WH7350> from far יָבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> shall come וּבְנֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH1323> and thy daughters עַל־ <WH5921> in צַ֥ד <WH6654> at [thy] side תֵּאָמַֽנָה׃ <WH539> shall be nursed

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תִּרְאִי֙ <WH7200> will see וְנָהַ֔רְתְּ <WH5102> and flow together וּפָחַ֥ד <WH6342> shall fear וְרָחַ֖ב <WH7337> and be enlarged לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <WH3824> and thine heart כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because יֵהָפֵ֤ךְ <WH2015> shall be converted עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> and הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> because the abundance יָ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea חֵ֥יל <WH2428> unto thee the forces גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> shall come לָֽךְ׃

שִֽׁפְעַ֨ת <WH8229> The multitude גְּמַלִּ֜ים <WH1581> of camels תְּכַסֵּ֗ךְ <WH3680> shall cover בִּכְרֵ֤י <WH1070> thee the dromedaries מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> of Midian וְעֵיפָ֔ה <WH5891> and Ephah כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> All מִשְּׁבָ֣א <WH7614> all they from Sheba יָבֹ֑אוּ <WH935> shall come זָהָ֤ב <WH2091> gold וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <WH3828> and incense יִשָּׂ֔אוּ <WH5375> they shall bring וּתְהִלֹּ֥ת <WH8416> the praises יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יְבַשֵּֽׂרוּ׃ <WH1319> and they shall shew forth

כָּל־ <WH3605> All צֹ֤אן <WH6629> All the flocks קֵדָר֙ <WH6938> of Kedar יִקָּ֣בְצוּ <WH6908> shall be gathered together לָ֔ךְ אֵילֵ֥י <WH352> unto thee the rams נְבָי֖וֹת <WH5032> of Nebaioth יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <WH8334> shall minister יַעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> unto thee they shall come up עַל־ <WH5921> with רָצוֹן֙ <WH7522> with acceptance מִזְבְּחִ֔י <WH4196> on mine altar וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> the house תִּפְאַרְתִּ֖י <WH8597> of my glory אֲפָאֵֽר׃ <WH6286> and I will glorify

מִי־ <WH4310> Who אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> are these כָּעָ֣ב <WH5645> as a cloud תְּעוּפֶ֑ינָה <WH5774> Who [are] these [that] fly וְכַיּוֹנִ֖ים <WH3123> and as the doves אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲרֻבֹּתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH699> chimney

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely לִ֣י ׀ אִיִּ֣ים <WH339> Surely the isles יְקַוּ֗וּ <WH6960> shall wait וָאֳנִיּ֤וֹת <WH591> for me and the ships תַּרְשִׁישׁ֙ <WH8659> of Tarshish בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <WH7223> first לְהָבִ֤יא <WH935> to bring בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1121> thy sons מֵֽרָח֔וֹק <WH7350> from far כַּסְפָּ֥ם <WH3701> their silver וּזְהָבָ֖ם <WH2091> and their gold אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> For לְשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> with them unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔יִךְ <WH430> thy God וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> and to the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> because פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <WH6286> because he hath glorified

וּבָנ֤וּ <WH1129> shall build up בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons נֵכָר֙ <WH5236> of strangers חֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> thy walls וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4428> and their kings יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <WH8334> shall minister כִּ֤י <WH3588> in בְקִצְפִּי֙ <WH7110> unto thee for in my wrath הִכִּיתִ֔יךְ <WH5221> I smote וּבִרְצוֹנִ֖י <WH7522> thee but in my favour רִֽחַמְתִּֽיךְ׃ <WH7355> have I had mercy

וּפִתְּח֨וּ <WH6605> shall be open שְׁעָרַ֧יִךְ <WH8179> Therefore thy gates תָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> continually יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> nor night לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִסָּגֵ֑רוּ <WH5462> they shall not be shut לְהָבִ֤יא <WH935> that [men] may bring אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH413> to you חֵ֣יל <WH2428> unto thee the forces גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4428> and [that] their kings נְהוּגִֽים׃ <WH5090> [may be] brought

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הַגּ֧וֹי <WH1471> For the nation וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <WH4467> and kingdom אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יַעַבְד֖וּךְ <WH5647> that will not serve יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> thee shall perish וְהַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> yea [those] nations חָרֹ֥ב <WH2717> shall be utterly יֶחֱרָֽבוּ׃ <WH2717> wasted

כְּב֤וֹד <WH3519> The glory הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> of Lebanon אֵלַ֣יִךְ <WH413> about יָב֔וֹא <WH935> shall come בְּר֛וֹשׁ <WH1265> unto thee the fir tree תִּדְהָ֥ר <WH8410> the pine tree וּתְאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH8391> and the box יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together לְפָאֵר֙ <WH6286> to beautify מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> the place מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <WH4720> of my sanctuary וּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> and I will make the place רַגְלַ֖י <WH7272> of my feet אֲכַבֵּֽד׃ <WH3513> glorious

וְהָלְכ֨וּ <WH1980> thee shall come אֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> about שְׁח֙וֹחַ֙ <WH7817> bending בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons מְעַנַּ֔יִךְ <WH6031> also of them that afflicted וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <WH7812> thee shall bow themselves down עַל־ <WH5921> at כַּפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> at the soles רַגְלַ֖יִךְ <WH7272> of thy feet כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מְנַֽאֲצָ֑יִךְ <WH5006> unto thee and all they that despised וְקָ֤רְאוּ <WH7121> and they shall call לָךְ֙ עִ֣יר <WH5892> thee The city יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> The Zion קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

תַּ֧חַת <WH8478> Whereas הֱיוֹתֵ֛ךְ <WH1961> have been עֲזוּבָ֥ה <WH5805> forsaking וּשְׂנוּאָ֖ה <WH8130> and hated וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no עוֹבֵ֑ר <WH5674> so that no man went through וְשַׂמְתִּיךְ֙ <WH7760> [thee] I will make לִגְא֣וֹן <WH1347> excellency עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> thee an eternal מְשׂ֖וֹשׂ <WH4885> a joy דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations

וְיָנַקְתְּ֙ <WH3243> Thou shalt also suck חֲלֵ֣ב <WH2461> the milk גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles וְשֹׁ֥ד <WH7699> the breast מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> of kings תִּינָ֑קִי <WH3243> and shalt suck וְיָדַ֗עַתְּ <WH3045> and thou shalt know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I the LORD מֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֔ךְ <WH3467> [am] thy Saviour וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <WH1350> and thy Redeemer אֲבִ֥יר <WH46> the mighty One יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Instead הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <WH5178> For brass אָבִ֣יא <WH935> I will bring זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> gold וְתַ֤חַת <WH8478> and instead הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> and for iron אָ֣בִיא <WH935> I will bring כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> silver וְתַ֤חַת <WH8478> and instead הָֽעֵצִים֙ <WH6086> and for wood נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> brass וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> and instead הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> and for stones בַּרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> iron וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> I will also make פְקֻדָּתֵךְ֙ <WH6486> thy officers שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> peace וְנֹגְשַׂ֖יִךְ <WH5065> and thine exactors צְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> righteousness

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִשָּׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> shall no more be heard ע֤וֹד <WH5750> again חָמָס֙ <WH2555> Violence בְּאַרְצֵ֔ךְ <WH776> in thy land שֹׁ֥ד <WH7701> wasting וָשֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> nor destruction בִּגְבוּלָ֑יִךְ <WH1366> within thy borders וְקָרָ֤את <WH7121> but thou shalt call יְשׁוּעָה֙ <WH3444> Salvation חוֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> thy walls וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <WH8179> and thy gates תְּהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> Praise לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become

לָּ֨ךְ ע֤וֹד <WH5750> longer הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> The sun לְא֣וֹר <WH216> shall be no more thy light יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> by day וּלְנֹ֕גַהּ <WH5051> neither for brightness הַיָּרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> shall the moon לֹא־ <WH3808> No יָאִ֣יר <WH215> light לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָה־ <WH1961> have לָ֤ךְ יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto thee but the LORD לְא֣וֹר <WH216> give light עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> shall be unto thee an everlasting וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <WH430> and thy God לְתִפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH8597> thy glory

לֹא־ <WH3808> will no יָב֥וֹא <WH935> shall no more go down עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer שִׁמְשֵׁ֔ךְ <WH8121> Thy sun וִירֵחֵ֖ךְ <WH3391> neither shall thy moon לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יֵאָסֵ֑ף <WH622> withdraw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> itself for the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> will have לָּךְ֙ לְא֣וֹר <WH216> light עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> shall be thine everlasting וְשָׁלְמ֖וּ <WH7999> shall be ended יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> and the days אֶבְלֵֽךְ׃ <WH60> of thy mourning

וְעַמֵּךְ֙ <WH5971> Thy people כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all צַדִּיקִ֔ים <WH6662> also [shall be] all righteous לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <WH3423> they shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land נֵ֧צֶר <WH5342> the branch [מַטָּעֹו כ] (מַטָּעַ֛י <WH4302> garden ק) מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יָדַ֖י <WH3027> of my hands לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <WH6286> that I may be glorified

הַקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> A little one יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become לָאֶ֔לֶף <WH505> shall become a thousand וְהַצָּעִ֖יר <WH6810> and a small one לְג֣וֹי <WH1471> nation עָצ֑וּם <WH6099> a strong אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD בְּעִתָּ֥הּ <WH6256> it in his time אֲחִישֶֽׁנָּה׃ <WH2363> will hasten ס
